title: Sibling Advicery: TikTok Kids/Drunk at Work
description:
Bob and Monét are back again this week giving advice to Patreon subscribers! We hear from a woman who doesn't want to apologize to her partner when she isn't sorry, a guy who has a forbidden crush on a conservative hottie, and Kim and Kanye themselves write in to Bob and Monet to ask for parenting help as they go through their divorce. Tune in to hear what Bob and Monet think about being drunk on the job and what it means if a friend slaps your a**!!
Visit SquareSpace.com for a free trial, and when you are ready to launch, go to SquareSpace.com/rivalry to save 10% of your first purchase of a website or domain!
Everlywell is offering a special discount of 20% off an at-home lab test at everlywell.com/rivalry.
Visit letsgetchecked.com and enter rivalry at checkout to ensure you and your significant other are staying safe.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
